word: G4979 - σχοινίον - schoiníon - skhoy-nee'-on - Small cord

sections.paragraph: a cord, rope made of rushes
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Diminutive of σχοῖνος schoinos (a rush or flag plant; of uncertain derivation); a rushlet, that is, grass withe or tie (genitive case): - small cord, rope.
